flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in writing speed is 10 words/minute - 7 words/minute = <<10-7=3>>3 words/minute
Matt can write 3 words/minute x 5 minutes = <<3*5=51>>51 more words with his right hand.
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
